Name: Steam Heroes
About the game: Help three brave adventurers on their quest to stop the diabolical Baron Von Smogâ€™s plot to conquer Steam Land. However, there is an army of evil minions that stand in your way. Challenge yourself in this new puzzle strategy game; includes 12 action-packed stages, a full soundtrack, competitive online play, all in stunning 720p HD Graphics. It's up to you to save Steam Land! Using classic Match-3 gameplay, use your skill and cunning to give power to your 3 heroes and their unique abilities. Matching colours generates steam of that type; your character then utilise the Steam to heal, attack and defend your party. Unlike many other Match-3 games, not every match is a good one. Think ahead carefully and ensure that your character use their special combo attacks to defeat the bosses!
